results:
Based on the search results, I can provide you with comprehensive information about "The Master and Margarita" (2024) film directed by Michael Lockshin and its box office achievement:

## Film Details and Box Office Success

The Master and Margarita is a Russian fantasy-drama film directed by Michael Lockshin and based on Mikhail Bulgakov's novel of the same name, which premiered January 25, 2024.(no content)The movie became the highest-grossing film released with a 18+ content rating ever in Russia and #7 all time box office, with over 2.3 billion rubles (over 27 million dollars).(no content)The film quickly became one of the highest-grossing films in Russian history and Russia's highest-grossing movie with an 18+ content rating.(no content)Its Russian box office total currently stands at over $19.4 million and counting, enough to place it among the 30 highest-grossing Russian films in the country of all time.

## Record-Breaking Performance

By its second weekend, the film had made 1 billion rubles, according to the Cinema Foundation of Russia.(no content)In the first weekend alone the film amassed almost half a billion rubles.(no content)Since the release of "The Master and Margarita" on Jan. 25, the movie has been screened by 3.7 million people.

## Political Controversy and Success Despite Opposition

The movie was targeted by nationalist activists and some of the most famous pro-Putin public figures and propagandists, including Zakhar Prilepin, Tigran Keosayan and Vladimir Solovyev, who complained about the director's anti-war views on the Russian invasion of Ukraine.(no content)All of this despite the fact that state-run networks didn't promote the film like they normally would, and Lockshin and the film have been the target of criticism and conspiracy theories from Putin supporters.

The film's success is particularly remarkable given the hostile environment it faced from Russian state media and the fact that it achieved these record-breaking numbers for an 18+ rated film in Russian cinema history.
